title: Hospitals don't burn down
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Fire prevention - Study and teaching
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Fire prevention - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fire prevention - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hospital evacuation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hospitals - Safety measures
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hospitals - Fires and fire prevention
description: A disturbingly realistic film about a fire in a high-rise hospital. It dramatically portrays the horror and awful consequences of such a tragedy. Demonstrates the results of good and bad training and the need for all personnel to learn basic drills and routines in case of fire. Cast includes Jeanne Drynan, Mark Edwards, Ray Marshall, Ralph Cotterill, Ken Goodlet.
